name: RPG Maker MV Plugins Animated Enemies & Splash Screen With Sound
name_original: RPG Maker MV Plugins Animated Enemies & Splash Screen With Sound
description:
Animated enemies plugin allows you to animated enemies of any size however only one type of animation is supported which is idle currently. Planned to do more but I'll upload this for now

Splash screen with sound is a simple plugin that allows 1 splash screen image that plays a sound a long with it. There is a bug currently with it where depending how slow the game is running the sound will delay.

Credit: 

kadokawa @ https://www.rpgmakerweb.com

Purchace RPG Maker MV Here:

https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/products/rpg-maker-mv
